=== Calculent Astra Child Theme ===
Contributors: vajid74
Tags: child-theme, astra, responsive, custom
Requires at least: 5.0
Tested up to: 6.4
Stable tag: 1.0.0
License: GPL v2 or later
License URI: https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html

A child theme for Astra WordPress theme, customized for Calculent.

== Description ==
The Calculent Astra Child Theme is a custom child theme built on top of the popular Astra WordPress theme. It provides a solid foundation for customization and extends the functionality of the parent Astra theme.

== Features ==
- Built on the powerful Astra theme framework
- Clean, well-structured code
- Proper theme inheritance
- Text domain for translations
- Fully responsive design
- Easy to customize

== Installation ==
1. Make sure you have Astra theme installed and activated
2. Upload the calculent-child folder to wp-content/themes/
3. Go to Appearance > Themes in WordPress admin
4. Activate the Calculent Astra Child theme

== Theme Structure ==
- style.css - Main theme stylesheet
- functions.php - Theme functions and hooks
- header.php - Theme header template
- footer.php - Theme footer template
- index.php - Main template file
- single.php - Single post template
- page.php - Page template
- archive.php - Archive template
- sidebar.php - Sidebar widget area
- template-parts/ - Reusable template parts
- languages/ - Translation files

== Changelog ==

= 1.0.0 =
* Initial release
* Complete child theme structure
* All basic template files
* Text domain setup
